notes:
Is the boss of Warlord Level, Pit #6.
[[Gnorre Chyllson|Next #7]]
sounds: Didn't you leave your house door open?
name: The Masked Marauder
behaviour: He's strong. So, don't forget to use [[Stone Skin Amulet]]s.
strategy:
'''Be sure you can't run away from this monster.''' It is not so fast, but its distance attack is as lethal as a real [[Dark Torturer]]. To all vocations keep diagonal to avoid waves.
Druid or Sorcerer: Use [[Magic Shield]] and [[SD]].
Knight: Melee and [[Fierce Berserk]].
Paladin: Shoot and use [[Divine Missile]].
